channel.title: Calendars Strawberries on tracker
channel.description: Recent content in Calendars Strawberries on tracker

item.title: Strawberries are in for the 2008 season
item.description:
via arborparents, a report that strawberries are in at Rowe's Produce Farm - head there from the Rawsonville Road exit, south to Martz Rd between Ypsi and Belleville.

Price of strawberries is $1.43/lb.

www.rowesproducefarm.com

UPDATE: Peas too!

Hello Rowe's Produce Farm customers,

SUGAR SNAP PEAS ARE NOW READY TO BE PICKED!!!!!

We opened our first field of sugar snap peas for picking today and they are LOADED. Now is the time to pick!

The price of the peas is the same as last season, $16.00 per bushel, $9.00 per half bushel, $5.00 per peck basket or if you just want a few they are $1.25 per pound.

Strawberries picking is fantastic now also so don't wait too long to get in on this years fun!

We are hoping the English peas and Chinese pea pods will be ready this weekend. We will keep you informed.

Thank you and have a very berry day!

Rowe's
